thread.title_full: economical business accommodation - Review of Travelodge London Stratford, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ken M
title: economical business accommodation
text:
Needed a room in London in the busy period &th-9th November. as I was at Excel I was looking for good value for a couple of nights with breakfast. Travelodge come to the rescue with it's Stratford Hotel A double room foer two nights under Â£150.00 Breakfast and evening meals extra but also Good value. Six stops away from Excel makes this a very attractive spot for any major event.
Room Tip: Make sure you get a higher room if you're on the front of the building See more room tips
